name: Anti Eye Craft (Hauntaku)
description:
It's time to suit up and blast off in this fast-paced shoot-em-up!

STORY

Sam and her team have been entrusted with clearing up a massive eyebat invasion. What are eyebats? They are robotic creatures controlled by an evil madman bent on revenge!

FEATURES

• Story mode: Play the original campaign from the first Anti Eye Craft.

• Mission mode: Take down the whole fleet of 1000 eyebats and save the galaxy!

• Endless mode: Practice your spaceship-piloting skills and blast those holographic eyebats!

• Take a seat and pilot one of the 8 unique spaceships.

• Listen to the catchy music made by Sam's friend (Kimmy) as you fly through space at lightspeed!

• Join this team of underdogs on their mission today!
